text: La Corte-San PieroStatuto comunale di Calci, Art. 4. is a village in Tuscany, central Italy, administratively a frazione of the comune of Calci, province of Pisa. The village is composed by the two hamlets of La Corte and San Piero. It is about 10 km from Pisa and 1 km from the municipal seat of La Pieve. == References == == Bibliography == * Category:Frazioni of the Province of Pisa
title: La Corte-San Piero
